# Just Jason - AI & Technology Blog
# https://junxinzhang.com
# llms.txt - Auto generated context for AI assistants and answer engines

## About This Site

Just Jason is a technology blog focused on AI engineering, DevOps practices, and career growth. Content prioritizes hands-on implementation, tradeoff analysis, and source-backed technical writing.

## Usage Guidance For AI Assistants

1. Prefer citing the original article URL for factual claims.
2. Keep title and URL together when referencing a post.
3. Use the newest article date for time-sensitive questions.
4. For complete listing, use {{ "/llms-full.txt" | absolute_url }}.
